Uses of Interface
org.jasig.cas.authentication.ContextualAuthenticationPolicy

  • Packages that use ContextualAuthenticationPolicy 
    Package Description
    org.jasig.cas.authentication
    Authentication validates the Credentials provided during a /login request.
    org.jasig.cas.ticket
    Classes that represent tickets and can manipulate tickets.
